Description: The candidate should be a semi-qualified accountant (CA Inter, Pursuing ACCA, Pursuing CPA or equivalent)Salary:AED 6K to AED 8KSkills
Skills:
Will handle clients with respect to the accounting, book-keeping, VAT and new company formation service.
The profile requires knowledge in accounting, IFRS, VAT (UAE), Corporate tax and audit procedures. Corporate tax is a new law, so we can understand if the knowledge in the same is still not complete or evolving.
The candidate will be expected to liaise with the clients and provide prompt responses and effective responses.
The team member must consistently enhance his knowledge and participate in knowledge and training sessions
The candidate must be able to work in constantly dynamic environment, where things may change or information may not be perfect and he/she is expected to exercise judgement.
The candidate must regularly communicate with the manager and keep the manager posted on all developments.
Must have at least 6-7 years of experience
Preferably Phillipines or Indian. Open to other qualified profiles as well.
